# Solution: Customer Portal

## Overview

This solution provides a self-service portal for customers to manage their accounts,
view orders, and submit support requests.

## Business Context

Customers need 24/7 access to account information without calling support.

## Goals & KPIs

- **Goal**: Reduce support call volume
  - *KPI*: 30% reduction in support calls within 6 months

## Stakeholders

- Customer: Primary user of the portal
- Support Team: Benefits from reduced call volume

## Constraints

- **Regulatory**: Must comply with data protection regulations
- **Business**: Must launch within Q2
